data.comment: The referee blows his whistle to start the first-half. Reading with the kick-off.
Goal! Reading have got their heads in front thanks to a Yakou Meite strike.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second half is underway in Reading - Rotherham with the kick-off.
The away team replace Jamie Lindsay with George Hirst.
In the minute 64, Matthew Olosunde is replacing Florian Jozefzoon for the away team.
Lucas Joao is on a sub for George Puscas for Reading.
Reading make their second substitution with Michael Olise replacing Ovie Ejaria.
In the minute 71, Paul Warne (Rotherham) is making a third substitution, with Freddie Ladapo replacing Wes Harding.
Goal! Reading extend their lead to 2-0 through Yakou Meite.
The home team have replaced Alfa Semedo with Tom McIntyre. This is the third substitution made today by Veljko Paunovic.
An attacking Reading player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Richard Wood (Rotherham) gets a yellow card.
Michael Ihiekwe for Rotherham has been booked by Matt Donohue and receives a first yellow card.
Lucas Joao smashes in a penalty at Madejski Stadium. The score is now 3-0.
